page.title: 19EMPLOYMENT IN THE SAMPFORDS
page.content: In the Sampfords,from our survey the people are employed in many different kinds of work.One of the most popular types of work is farming.Some people are farmers while others do other farming jobs.Teaching is another popular type of work with the Sampford people.Salesmen and engineers come high on the list of employees.We noticed that we also have a cook and a chef in the village.In most families only one person works.From the survey,it was noticeable that many people who live in the Sampfords have to travel to go to their work.The farmers were the people who lived within 5 miles of their work.Teachers often travel between 10+20 miles to reach their schools.Other people travelled even further.However there are several who work at home.
